p: Mentha piperita is a herbaceous and perennial plant. Peppermint is one of the medicinal plants that has attracted the attention of researchers due to its numerous medicinal effects (Fazel, 2004 ▶). According to a previous study, menthol is the most commonly used compound of mint, which is an important disinfectant and has marked antibiotic effects; also, it can cause a cool sensation in the skin and mucosa (Chevallier, 2003 ▶).
